vc.noVC: 🚫 - No valid VC detected. Please join a VC and try again.
vc.differentVC: 🚫 - You need to be in the same VC as me to use this command.
vc.noQuery: 🚫 - Please provide a query to search for.
vc.invalidFormat: 🚫 - Invalid format. Please use the following format: `12h34m56s`
vc.outOfLength: 🚫 - The time you provided is out of the length of the song.
vc.noMusic: 🚫 - There is no music in the queue.
vc.noMoreToSkip: 🚫 - There are no more songs to skip.
vc.noMoreToBack: 🚫 - There are no more songs to go back.
vc.backed: ⏮️ - Went back to the previous song.

config.langChanged: 🌐 - Language has been changed to English.
